settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to ship?
settings.text:
After processing, your order is shipped and will be delivered within 4-7 business days depending on your location via USPS First Class Mail. 

Please allow 10 business days for your package to be delivered. If your order still hasn't been delivered at this time, send us an email at info@yoga-society.com and we will look into this for you!

settings.title: Do our masks have filters/filter inserts?
settings.text: There is no filter or insert for filters in our masks.

settings.title: Do you offer kids masks?
settings.text: Yes. These masks are made for ages 3-8. Click here to shop.

settings.title: How long is processing?
settings.text: Orders are processed 1-2 business days prior to shipment.

settings.title: What mask guidelines do we follow?
settings.text: Our masks are made in accordance with California Department of Public Health guidelines

settings.title: I placed my order, now what?
settings.text: We will send you a confirmation email of your order within 1-2 days. Then your order will be shipped and delivered within 4-7 days. You will receive a shipping confirmation email that includes your tracking number.

settings.title: Where are our masks made?
settings.text: All our masks are made in and ship from Los Angeles, California, USA.

settings.title: Do you have different styles of masks?
settings.text: Yes, we offer multiple styles of masks. Click here to see all options.

settings.title: If I need my order to be adjusted, how can I contact your team?
settings.text: Orders are fulfilled quickly so please email us as soon as possible at info@yoga-society.com. Our customer service hours are 9am-5pm Monday-Friday. We cannot ensure that we will be able to adjust your order, but we will do our best!

settings.title: What are wash instructions for our masks?
settings.text: All masks are machine washable and dryer safe on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low.

NAMA is a mother–daughter range of carefully curated accessories and home furnishings.

We are two women with a shared love of travel, design, diverse cultures, and beautiful things, and every item in the NAMA range is infused with that love. 

The seed for NAMA was planted during a trip we took together to India in 2018. We felt inspired to share the nuggets of beauty and magic that we came across with a wider community of people who would be able to derive as much joy from them as we do. 

Our first collection pays homage to India and its people, whose rich history of artisanship is unsurpassed. All of the pieces in the collection were made in collaboration with local businesses and talented craftspeople, who draw on centuries-old traditions and use region-specific techniques to produce their elegant wares. In many cases, pieces are constructed by hand, with great care, making them inimitable in the truest sense.  

Woven into each NAMA piece is a tapestry of stories: the story of the piece’s production, the story of the people who helped create it, the story of the place it comes from.  

You will find some of these stories here on our website and on the postcards you receive with each purchase. 

Finally, though, there is the story of what your NAMA piece will mean to you, its newfound owner. This last story is yours to write. 

Thank you for sharing in the NAMA story. 

With love,

Natasha and Mathy

settings.title: Wholesale
settings.text: Ask us about our discounted prices for wholesale orders! Our team is available to assist you with your custom bulk order and offer exclusive wholesale pricing.

settings.title: About
settings.text:
Planet Rhinestone is a premier supplier of high quality rhinestone products. We pride ourselves on offering the best products at affordable prices to satisfy all your rhinestone needs. 

Whether you’re creating an original design from scratch or looking to bring a personal touch to an existing piece, we have exactly what you need. No matter the project we’re here to help make you sparkle!
